COMMAND.NAME: savebufferas
COMMAND.PARAMETER: bufferName The unique name of an e93 buffer.
COMMAND.OUTPUT: If the save succeeds, the buffer is renamed, and the new name is returned.
COMMAND.STATUS:
This command will return an error in the following cases:
bufferName is not provided.
bufferName is not an e93 buffer.
newPath is not provided.
The target file newPath cannot be created.
